## VirtualScrollPagingOptions interface

Virtual scroll paging options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface VirtualScrollPagingOptions extends PagingOptions<CssClassesVirtualScrollPaging> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [loadOffsetTreshold](./grid.virtualscrollpagingoptions.loadoffsettreshold.md) | <code>number</code> | Offset between 0 and 1 which indicates when to start loading next page, 0.8 means 80% of scrolling distance |
